comments.body: I switched the annotation from `.. note:: Evolving.` to this. I think user-facing doc should just better have it as prose. Looks like Python side can't use the annotation like approach unlike Scaladoc or Javadoc.
I will document what "evolving" and "experimental" means in the doc later by referring to Scala's annotations in a separate PR.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +547,551 @@        Notes
        -----
        This API is evolving.

        Returns
